member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_INPUT
member.summary: Input structure for the FSCTL_REPAIR_COPIES control code. It describes a single block of data and indicates which of the copies is to be copied to the specified copies of the data. The

member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_INPUT.FileOffset
member.summary: The file position to start the repair operation.

member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_INPUT.Length
member.summary: The number of bytes to be repaired.

member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_INPUT.SourceCopy
member.summary: The zero-based copy number of the source copy.

member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_INPUT.NumberOfRepairCopies
member.summary: The number of copies that will be repaired. This is the size of the RepairCopiesarray.

member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_INPUT.RepairCopies
member.summary: The zero-based copy numbers of the copies that will be repaired.
